text: The 1968 All-Ireland Intermediate Hurling Championship was the eighth staging of the All-Ireland hurling championship. The championship ended on 29 September 1968. London were the defending champions and successfully retained the title following a 4-15 to 0-3 defeat of Dublin in the final. ==External links== * Rolls of honour Intermediate Category:All-Ireland Intermediate Hurling Championships
title: 1968 All-Ireland Intermediate Hurling Championship
